7.desc:
every third shot, each arrow creates an explosion (1d, 10p, explosion type) on first hit
note: bloons can be hit by both the arrow and the explosion, unlike most secondary effects

10.desc:
activated ability 2 (70s cooldown): arrow-storm attack (6d, 12md, ∞p, 100r centred according to Quincy's targetting, 3s duration, each target has a small chance of being hit on any given frame)
note: the above description is only speculative, based on an observed average of about 8.58 hits per bloon

15.desc:
ability 1 cooldown reduced to 45s
ability 1 buffed: 25%s

18.desc:
ability 2 cooldown reduced to 56s
arrow-storm buffed: now averages about 12.518 hits per bloon

20.desc: arrow-storm buffed: +4d (10), +4md (20), about 16.29 hits per bloon

3.desc: activated ability 1 (30s cooldown): places firewall (1d, 40p, 0.1s, 12s lifetime) on the track

4.desc: every 30th shot comes with a heatwave (3d, ∞p, applies a buff (lead, +1p) to towers in range for 8s)

6.desc: fire attack buffed: applies burn status (1d/1.5s, 3s duration)

10.desc: activated ability 2 (60s cooldown): firestorm attack (2d, ∞p, ∞r, fire type, applies a burn (1d/0.5s or 10md/1s, 8s duration))

17.desc: heatwave buffed: buff also grants +1d, +1 lead damage (2)

4.desc: gains a buff (90%s, target: bombs and mortars)

3.desc: activated ability 1 (16s cooldown): concussive-shell attack (2d, 48p, normal type, 1.5s stun, targets strongest)

5.desc: any explosion hitting a black bloon has a 50% chance to damage it

7.desc:
+1d (2)
gains a buff (+10% blast radius, target: mortars)

8.desc: gains a buff (+25%p, +5%r, target: bombs in range)

10.desc: activated ability 2 (80s cooldown): every bomb or mortar ability is immediately ready to use

14.desc: concussive-shell buffed: 50% longer stun (2.25s), ~50 blast radius

18.desc: gains a buff (90%s, target: bombs and mortars), which stacks multiplicatively with the level 4 buff

20.desc: ability 2 buffed: for the next 10s, every bomb and mortar has double damage and double pierce

2.desc: gains a buff (+1p, target: magic in range)

4.desc:
gains natures-ward attack (18s, places a ward on the track)
ward has a 15s lifetime, and a slow attack (32r, 30% slow)
note: camos can be slowed, but the ward does not allow camos in range to be targetted by subs

3.desc: activated ability 1 (35s cooldown) places brambles (1d, 50p, sharp type) on the track

10.desc:
activated ability 2 (90s cooldown): places a tree (3000p) on the track, which pops anything up to its pierce limit with a +1 cash modifier, but stores this cash until the pierce is entirely used up
note: blimps can only be captured if their remaining RBE does not exceed the tree's remaining pierce, while bloons are always captured even if this overshoots

11.desc: buff improved: now grants +3p and +5r to magic monkeys

18.desc:
gains a buff: whenever a round starts, all xx3 druids gain the maximum 200 pops for +100% speed
note: idle time before a druid has started attacking on a round does not count for resetting the pop counter

1.desc:
slam attack (2d, 2cd (4), 24r, 1.1s, impact, normal type, has an aoe (1d, 2cd (3), 10p))
note: the aoe (area of effect) can affect the original target

3.desc: activated ability 1 (40s cooldown): gains a buff (+1d, target: anything within 30 units, including self) for 7s

5.desc: every 5th slam is replaced by slap (2d, 10p, applies knockback status (move backwards at 3× normal speed, 1s duration) to targets up to MOABs)

6.desc:
both attacks apply a 0.3s stun to bloons
note: this results in less knockback because the bloons spend some of the time stunned

10.desc: activated ability 2 (20s cooldown): grabs the strongest non-BAD blimp in range, spends 4s removing the top layer, then stuns the children for 2s

13.desc:
stun buffed: affects blimps for 0.2s
note: there is no additional stun for regular bloons, contrary to the description

14.desc: ability 1 buffed: +10r (40), 12s duration; also grants +3cd and +3md

20.desc: ability 2 buffed: affects up to 4 blimps

1.desc: shell attack (0d, 0.7s, 63r, creates an explosion on hit (1d, 15p, explosion type, ~24 blast radius) up to three times)

3.desc: activated ability 1 (30s cooldown): for the next ~(7.6 + 0.51 level)s, shell can create 2 additional explosions, explosion has +3cd (4), +3md (4), and all attacks have normal type

5.desc: gains machine-gun attack (1d, 1p, 0.1s, sharp type, targets first)

7.desc:
shell buffed: can create 4 explosions
explosion buffed: +1d (2)

10.desc: activated ability 2 (60s cooldown): deals up to 1600d to the strongest and the 9 last blimps, spread out over 7.5s into 16 100d missiles

12.desc:
shell buffed: can create 6 explosions
explosion buffed: +1d (3)

20.desc:
ability 2 cooldown reduced to 30s
ability 2 buffed: missiles now do 250d each for 4000d total, and explosion has +3d for the duration of the barrage

1.desc:
dummy attack: 20r
$100 end of round income

4.desc: gains skimming attack: earns $1 for every new bloon spawned, regardless of the round income modifier

3.desc: activated ability 1 (30s cooldown): grants a buff (+1d, target: nearest 4 towers) for 6s, then disables the same towers for 2s

5.desc: gains a buff: (+5% income, target: x3+x farms)

7.desc:
gains trojan attack: (random from ~5s-7s, targets a random bloon from rank 5 (pink) to 10 (MOAB), applies corrupted status (spawns no children, +rank cash modifier))
note: cash due to trojan is not affected by the round income modifier

10.desc:
activated ability 2 (65s cooldown): anything other than a DDT or BAD spawning in the next 10s will be one rank lower, and give double cash
note: the double is applied after all other cash buffs

13.desc: ability 1 buffed: now +2d to the nearest 6 towers for 8s

14.desc: +5 end of round healing (10), starting lives +100

16.desc:
trojan buffed: ~3-4s
corrupted status now gives +2 rank cash modifier

18.desc: trojan buffed: can now also target camo bloons, BFBs, and DDTs

20.desc: ability 2 buffed: lasts 20s, affected bloons now give triple cash

1.desc:
curse attack (1d, 40r, 1.2s, impact, plasma type, applies cursed status (1d/2.5s, 2.6s duration), creates a splash (1d, 5p))
camo
note: curses can be stacked, but with a 1s shorter maximum duration each time. All existing durations are also refreshed to their original value regardless of whether a new one is added. So at this level, curses of duration 2.6s, 1.6s, and 0.6s can be placed, although only the first two last long enough to be sustained.
note: the splash does not affect the original target

4.desc:
curse buffed: +1d (2)
splash buffed: now also applies the cursed status

3.desc: activated ability 1 (60s cooldown): for the next 6 seconds, constantly applies antigrow status (cannot regrow, 6s duration) to everything

7.desc:
activated ability 2 (90s cooldown): uses 10 lives to create a totem
totem has a 30s lifetime, and grants a buff (+1p, 85%s, +15%r, camo, target: anything within 78 units)
note/possible bug: primary towers get +25% range rather than +15%

9.desc: curse buffed (including splash): gains decamo, degrow, and defortify on-damage effects

10.desc: activated ability 3 (60s cooldown): applies hex status ((4%+1)d/1s, 25s duration, spawns no children) to the strongest blimp on screen other than BADs; transfers to the next strongest target if it pops with time remaining

12.desc:
ability 1 cooldown reduced to 45s
ability 1 buffed: ability and antigrow status now both last 15s

20.desc:
ability 3 cooldown reduced to 40s
hex status buffed: (5%+1)d/1s, can affect BADs

3.desc: **activated ability 1** (45s cooldown): for 10s, pierce and range are doubled, and damage type is normal

7.desc: activated ability 2 (10s cooldown) sacrifices a chosen tower to gain 4x the amount spent on it as XP

10.desc: activated ability 3 (60s cooldown): gains ball-of-light attack (2d, 8p, 0.05s, plasma type) for 12s

20.desc:
*ability 3* buffed: 20d, normal type, 20s duration
if a super monkey is upgraded to 5xx in range, Adora transforms into *sun-form* (+5d, +30p)
